pr_title: default-component: add an option to control if RAW values need to be resolved when computing endpoint parameters

     }

timeline.message: default-component: add an option to control if RAW values need to be resolved when computing endpoint parameters
default-component: add an option to control if RAW values need to be resolved when computing endpoint parameters
